text: BTV-Seg-9 encodes the minor core protein VP6, which is a helicase. Recent bioinformatic analyses have identified a new overlapping ORF in Seg-9 of both insect-borne and tick-borne orbiviruses, although the putative protein (identified here as NS4) varies in size between 10 kDa and 22.5 kDa [17, 18] .
